text: the one thing that uh people here have
is energy to to work hard toward their
goals and to make sure they step up for
whatever whatever it is out there that
needs them well when I needed them the
most they have been there all the
way I was born in Rio my mom is a
dentist and my father is an engineer as
myself education in my family has always
been very important my grandparents went
to Brazil with no diploma no money and
they worked really hard all their lives
to make sure my parents and I would have
better
chances my mom when she was uh 19 she
was diagnosed with a Ms you can imagine
that almost 40 years ago in Brazil it
was a big deal the doctor said she
couldn't have kids and her expectations
about life were not that optimistic but
she never gave up so since I was very
very young I think I always had this
sense of responsibility of making my
life worth it and making a difference
and studying and getting the best
education that I
[Music]
could when uh I came here from uh an
engineering background I would get my
cases and I would read them and try to
solve the case with like all the skills
and all the theories and all the
Frameworks and I would get to a certain
conclusion and say okay this is the
solution youd go to class and you'd hear
90 different brilliant people coming to
completely different conclusions to
learn how to well first be open to
engage with them and be able to
coordinate and make sure that you would
arrive to the best approach collectively
that has already been very valuable to
me I lost someone very close and very
important to me last year I had to learn
how to make decisions
about how how was the best way to help
someone with
cancer he was very very passionate about
his work he helped a lot of people it
made me realize life is really not about
how How It Ends or how many goals you
you manage to accomplish it's much more
about how meaningful it is and how happy
you were and how happy you made everyone
around you uh right now my own country
is going through a major disruption and
I I want to make sure I'm there to to
help make this an opportunity to to
reshape the country and to make it a
better place
